ComicInfo.Title: Rise of the Midnight Sons Part 6
ComicInfo.Summary: The Midnight Sons, with a few protective spells, take on the demonic Lilin deep in the frozen arctic. Many of the monsters fall and Lilith herself is seemingly destroyed by being shoved into her own chest-portal. But this is not the end, for she returns and eats her own last offspring to regain power.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-23 21:28:53. [CVDB66446] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-20 23:37:07. [Issue ID 66446]
